attributes.action: Urge the French Government to invite The Queen to D Day Celebrations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M. Sarkozy should respect our loyalties to our Queen and the role she has played in supporting our Armed Forces. Unlike him she was around during World War Two and probably has more right to be there than he himself!

rejection.details: Your petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
